mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${group}(pat_id, nur_id, doc_id, pat_pass, pat_name, pat_gen, pat_jumin, pat_addr, pat_phone, pat_email, pat_job) VALUES (#{id},#{nurID},#{docID},#{pass},#{name},#{gen},#{jumin},#{addr},#{phone},#{email},#{job})
INSERT INTO ${group}(doc_id, doc_pass, major_treat, doc_name, doc_gen, doc_phone, doc_email, doc_position) VALUES (#{id},#{pass},#{major},#{name},#{gen},#{phone},#{email},#{position})
INSERT INTO ${group}(nur_id, nur_pass, major_job, nur_name, nur_gen, nur_phone, nur_email, nur_position) VALUES (#{id},#{pass},#{major},#{name},#{gen},#{phone},#{email},#{position})
INSERT INTO Chart(chart_contents) VALUES(#{chartContents}) WHERE chart_id=#{chartId}
mapper.select: select * from chartview where patientid=#{id} and chartid is not null;
